subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Walter Henning, a 17-year-old who is the nation’s No. 1-ranked schoolboy in the indoor weight throw, has been disappointed by the blots on his sport.
snippet: Walter Henning, a 17-year-old who is the nation’s No. 1-ranked schoolboy in the indoor weight throw, has been disappointed by the blots on his sport.
